title: One More 'Inside Look' Featurette for 'Jurassic World Rebirth' Sequel
description: "The movie has a lot of very scary, very intense, relentless moments..." ðŸ¦– Universal has posted a few more making of videos for Jurassic World Rebirth, to complement the awesome new trailer with a month left until release. Crashing into theaters worldwide in July â€“ bring it on! A standalone sequel to Jurassic World Dominion (2022) with its own mission, it is the 4th installment in the current Jurassic World series and the 7th film overall in this dinosaurs series. Directed by sci-fi mastermind Gareth Edwards - an expedition braves isolated equatorial regions to extract DNA from massive prehistoric creatures for a groundbreaking medical breakthrough. But this place is even more dangerous than anyone of them expected. They're stuck on this island now â€“Â who will make it out alive? JW Rebirth stars Scarlett Johansson, Mahershala Ali, Jonathan Bailey, with Rupert Friend, Manuel Garcia-Rulfo, Luna Blaise, David Iacono, and Ed Skrein. They're starting to show too much from this movie â€“ overhyping it with videos galore. If you're like me and want to enjoy it fresh, now is the time to stop watching more videos until it opens in theaters. Enjoy. Here's the extra "A Look Inside" promo for Gareth Edwards' [â€¦]
author: Alex Billington
excerpt: "The movie has a lot of very scary, very intense, relentless moments..." ðŸ¦– Universal has posted a few more making of videos for Jurassic World Rebirth, to complement the awesome new trailer with a month left until release. Crashing into theaters worldwide in July â€“ bring it on! A standalone sequel to Jurassic World Dominion
text: by June 10, 2025Source: YouTube "The movie has a lot of very scary, very intense, relentless moments..." ðŸ¦– Universal has posted a few more making of videos for Jurassic World Rebirth, to complement the awesome new trailer with a month left until release. Crashing into theaters worldwide in July â€“ bring it on! A standalone sequel to Jurassic World Dominion (2022) with its own mission, it is the 4th installment in the current Jurassic World series and the 7th film overall in this dinosaurs series. Directed by sci-fi mastermind Gareth Edwards - an expedition braves isolated equatorial regions to extract DNA from massive prehistoric creatures for a groundbreaking medical breakthrough. But this place is even more dangerous than anyone of them expected. They're stuck on this island now â€“Â who will make it out alive? JW Rebirth stars Scarlett Johansson, Mahershala Ali, Jonathan Bailey, with Rupert Friend, Manuel Garcia-Rulfo, Luna Blaise, David Iacono, and Ed Skrein. They're starting to show too much from this movie â€“ overhyping it with videos galore. If you're like me and want to enjoy it fresh, now is the time to stop watching more videos until it opens in theaters. Enjoy. Here's the extra "A Look Inside" promo for Gareth Edwards' Jurassic World Rebirth, from YouTube: You can rewatch the first trailer for Edwards' Jurassic World Rebirth movie right here and trailer #2 here. This action-packed new chapter sees an extraction team race to the most dangerous place on Earth, an island research facility for the original Jurassic Park, inhabited by the worst of the worst that were left behind. Five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion (released in 2022), the planet's ecology has proven largely inhospitable to dinosaurs. Those remaining exist in isolated equatorial environments with climates resembling the one in which they once thrived. The three most colossal creatures across land, sea and air within that tropical biosphere hold, in their DNA, the key to a drug that will bring miraculous life-saving benefits to humankind. Jurassic World Rebirth is directed by the acclaimed British sci-fi filmmaker Gareth Edwards, director of the sci-fi movies Monsters, Godzilla, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, and The Creator previously. The screenplay is written by David Koepp (also of Jurassic Park, Carlito's Way, Mission: Impossible, Premium Rush, Inferno, Kimi). Produced by Frank Marshall Patrick Crowley. Made by Amblin Entertainment and The Kennedy/Marshall Company. Universal will debut Edwards' Jurassic World Rebirth movie in theaters worldwide starting July 2nd, 2025 this summer movie season. Ready to watch? Find more posts in: Featurette, Hype, Sci-Fi, To Watch, Trailer
html:
by
June 10, 2025
Source: YouTube

"The movie has a lot of very scary, very intense, relentless moments..." ðŸ¦– Universal has posted a few more making of videos for Jurassic World Rebirth, to complement the awesome new trailer with a month left until release. Crashing into theaters worldwide in July â€“ bring it on! A standalone sequel to Jurassic World Dominion (2022) with its own mission, it is the 4th installment in the current Jurassic World series and the 7th film overall in this dinosaurs series. Directed by sci-fi mastermind Gareth Edwards - an expedition braves isolated equatorial regions to extract DNA from massive prehistoric creatures for a groundbreaking medical breakthrough. But this place is even more dangerous than anyone of them expected. They're stuck on this island now â€“Â who will make it out alive? JW Rebirth stars Scarlett Johansson, Mahershala Ali, Jonathan Bailey, with Rupert Friend, Manuel Garcia-Rulfo, Luna Blaise, David Iacono, and Ed Skrein. They're starting to show too much from this movie â€“ overhyping it with videos galore. If you're like me and want to enjoy it fresh, now is the time to stop watching more videos until it opens in theaters. Enjoy.

Here's the extra "A Look Inside" promo for Gareth Edwards' Jurassic World Rebirth, from YouTube:

You can rewatch the first trailer for Edwards' Jurassic World Rebirth movie right here and trailer #2 here.

This action-packed new chapter sees an extraction team race to the most dangerous place on Earth, an island research facility for the original Jurassic Park, inhabited by the worst of the worst that were left behind. Five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion (released in 2022), the planet's ecology has proven largely inhospitable to dinosaurs. Those remaining exist in isolated equatorial environments with climates resembling the one in which they once thrived. The three most colossal creatures across land, sea and air within that tropical biosphere hold, in their DNA, the key to a drug that will bring miraculous life-saving benefits to humankind. Jurassic World Rebirth is directed by the acclaimed British sci-fi filmmaker Gareth Edwards, director of the sci-fi movies Monsters, Godzilla, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, and The Creator previously. The screenplay is written by David Koepp (also of Jurassic Park, Carlito's Way, Mission: Impossible, Premium Rush, Inferno, Kimi). Produced by Frank Marshall Patrick Crowley. Made by Amblin Entertainment and The Kennedy/Marshall Company. Universal will debut Edwards' Jurassic World Rebirth movie in theaters worldwide starting July 2nd, 2025 this summer movie season. Ready to watch?

Find more posts in: Featurette, Hype, Sci-Fi, To Watch, Trailer
